# Industry Resources

A curated collection of APIs, UI components, datasets, infrastructure tools, and product validation platforms — extracted directly from each source.

---

## 1. APIs & Integrations

### APIs.guru - OpenAPI Directory
> **Wikipedia for Web APIs. Directory of REST API definitions.**

- **Format**: OpenAPI 3.0 specifications
- **GitHub Stars**: 4.2k+
- **Services**:
  - [Browse APIs](https://apis.guru/)
  - [Our API](https://apis.guru/api-doc) — Programmatic access to the directory
  - [Add API](https://apis.guru/add-api) — Submit your own API spec
  - [GraphQL Voyager](https://apis.guru/graphql-voyager/) — Interactive GraphQL schema visualization

**Use Case**: Auto-generate TypeScript types or SDKs from publicly available OpenAPI specs.

---

### RapidAPI Hub
> **Nokia acquired Rapid's technology assets, including the world's largest API marketplace.**

- **Categories**: 50+ including AI, Sports, Finance, Weather, SMS
- **Features**:
  - Unified API key management
  - Code snippets in multiple languages
  - API testing playground
  - Usage analytics dashboard

**Popular Searches**: Weather APIs, Crypto APIs, Translation APIs, Sports Data

---

### Postman Public API Network
> **Discover, test, and fork pre-built API collections for rapid prototyping.**

- **Collections Available**: 100,000+
- **Features**:
  - One-click fork to your workspace
  - Environment variables for quick testing
  - Real-time collaboration
  - Mock servers for offline development

**Use Case**: Import a pre-built Stripe, Twilio, or SendGrid collection to test integrations instantly.

---

## 2. UI Inspiration & Templates

### Tailwind UI (Tailwind Plus)
> **Beautiful UI components and templates by the creators of Tailwind CSS.**

| Category | Components |
|----------|------------|
| Hero Sections | 12 |
| CTA Sections | 11 |
| Pricing Sections | 12 |
| Stats | 8 |
| Testimonials | 8 |
| Team Sections | 9 |
| FAQs | 7 |
| Footers | 7 |
| Flyout Menus | 7 |
| 404 Pages | 5 |
| Landing Pages | 4 |
| About Pages | 3 |

**Total**: 500+ professionally designed components for Marketing, Application UI, and Ecommerce.

**Catalyst**: Professional-grade React UI kit with dark mode and accessibility built-in.

---

### shadcn/ui
> **A set of beautifully designed components you can customize, extend, and build on. Open Source. Open Code.**

- **Philosophy**: Copy-paste components, not npm packages — full ownership of code
- **Built On**: Radix UI primitives + Tailwind CSS
- **Sections**:
  - [Components](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/components)
  - [Blocks](https://ui.shadcn.com/blocks) — Pre-built layouts
  - [Charts](https://ui.shadcn.com/charts/area) — Data visualization components
  - [Create](https://ui.shadcn.com/create) — Start a new project

**Examples**: Dashboard, Tasks, Playground, Authentication pages

---

### Flowbite
> **Open-source Tailwind component library with vanilla JS, React, Vue, and Svelte variants.**

| Block Category | Components |
|----------------|------------|
| Hero Sections (Marketing) | 18 |
| Table Headers (Application) | 13 |
| Side Navigations (Application) | 12 |
| Feature Sections (Marketing) | 10 |
| CTA Sections (Marketing) | 10 |
| Content Sections (Marketing) | 9 |

**Frameworks**: HTML/JS, React, Vue, Svelte, Angular

---

### UIverse
> **The Largest Library of Open-Source UI elements. Community-built library of UI elements. Copy as HTML/CSS, Tailwind, React and Figma.**

**Platform Stats**: 4,261+ UI elements

**Categories**:
| Category | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| Buttons | Hover effects, 3D buttons, neon styles |
| Checkboxes | Custom styled checkboxes |
| Toggle switches | Animated toggles |
| Cards | Profile cards, product cards, glassmorphism |
| Loaders | Animated spinners, progress bars |
| Inputs | Text fields, search bars |
| Radio buttons | Custom radio selections |
| Forms | Complete form layouts |
| Patterns | Background patterns |
| Tooltips | Hover tooltips |

**Popular Components**:
| Component | Creator | Engagement |
|-----------|---------|------------|
| Orange Monkey 2 | andrew-demchenk0 | 62K views, 1.6K likes |
| Kind Otter 31 | kamehame-ha | 15K views, 651 likes |
| Rare Owl 43 | barisdogansutcu | 9.7K views, 696 likes |

**Export Formats**: HTML/CSS, Tailwind CSS, React, Figma

**Community**: Active Discord community for UI designers and developers

---

> **Discover the World's Top Designers & Creative Professionals**

**Popular Searches**:

- [Landing Page](https://dribbble.com/search/landing%20page)

- [Logo](https://dribbble.com/search/logo)
- [Icons](https://dribbble.com/search/icons)
- [App Design](https://dribbble.com/designers/app-design)

**Categories**: Animation, Branding, Illustration, Mobile, Print, Product Design, Typography, Web Design

**Top Designers**: Nadya Chunikhina, Lea Konaševská, ThreeDee, Damian Skotzke, QClay, Phenomenon Studio

---

### Behance
> **The World's Best Creators Are On Behance — A comprehensive platform for discovering inspiration and connecting with creative talent.**

**For Creatives**:
- [Try Behance Pro](https://www.behance.net/pro)
- [Find Inspiration](https://www.behance.net/galleries)
- [Get Hired](https://www.behance.net/updates/get-hired-on-behance)
- [Sell Creative Assets](https://www.behance.net/updates/behance-assets)
- [Sell Freelance Services](https://www.behance.net/updates/get-hired-on-behance-with-services)

- [Photographers](https://www.behance.net/hire/photographers)
- [Video Editors](https://www.behance.net/hire/video-editors)
- [Web Designers](https://www.behance.net/hire/web-designers)
- [Illustrators](https://www.behance.net/hire/illustrators)

**Part of Adobe ecosystem** — integrates with Adobe Portfolio

## 3. Industry Datasets & Catalogs

### Kaggle Datasets
> **Download Open Datasets on 1000s of Projects + Share Projects on One Platform**

- **Topics**: Government, Sports, Medicine, Fintech, Food, and more
- **Features**:
  - Flexible data ingestion
  - Integrated Jupyter notebooks
  - Community discussions and kernels
  - Competitions for machine learning

**Use Case**: Download a customer churn dataset to prototype a predictive model with notebooks included.

---

### Data.gov (US)
> **The Home of the U.S. Government's Open Data**

| Metric | Count |
|--------|-------|
| **Total Datasets** | 388,003 |

**Quick Access**:
- [Most Viewed Datasets](https://catalog.data.gov/dataset?q=&sort=views_recent+desc)
- [Recently Added Datasets](https://catalog.data.gov/dataset?q=&sort=metadata_created+desc)
- [Datasets by Organization](https://catalog.data.gov/organization/)
- [Geospatial Data](https://catalog.data.gov/dataset/?metadata_type=geospatial)

**Mission**: [About Us](https://www.data.gov/about/) | [Explore the timeline](https://www.data.gov/timeline/)

---

### Eurostat (EU)
> **Official EU Statistics Portal**

**Key Indicators**:
| Indicator | Explore |
|-----------|---------|
| Inflation Rate | [View](https://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/databrowser/bookmark/4ad27e6f-358a-4a3d-82a0-587d69a833eb?lang=en) |
| GDP Growth | [View](https://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/databrowser/bookmark/a4ce6a9d-7ef1-48f1-a5bf-e23a717fcf75?lang=en) |
| Unemployment Rate | [View](https://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/databrowser/bookmark/2feeff57-57c9-4278-a50b-7e2279d699c2?lang=en) |
| House Price Growth | [View](https://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/databrowser/bookmark/2c13e85b-3996-4e0d-8832-67f8dc71a7bb?lang=en) |
| Population | [View](https://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/databrowser/bookmark/edacacb0-acad-4876-859f-9549d766826b?lang=en) |
| Energy Inflation | [View](https://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/databrowser/bookmark/cd099aa2-8977-42d5-b5d8-bc5edd3a94df?lang=en) |
| Food Inflation | [View](https://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/databrowser/bookmark/8089dbc9-3b2f-4ab9-bfd2-23d2aa192d04?lang=en) |

**Data Tools**:
- [Database](https://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/web/main/data/database)
- [Statistical Themes](https://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/web/main/data/statistical-themes)
- [Interactive Publications](https://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/web/main/publications/interactive-publications)
- [Data Visualisations](https://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/web/main/data/data-visualisations)

## 4. Payments, Auth & Infrastructure

### Stripe Documentation
> **Explore our guides and examples to integrate Stripe.**

**Payments**:
- [Accept payments online](https://stripe.com/get-started/use-cases/startup)
- [Collect payments with invoices](https://stripe.com/get-started/use-cases/invoices)
- [Accept payments in-person](https://stripe.com/get-started/use-cases/in-person-payments)

**Revenue**:
- [Sell subscriptions](https://stripe.com/get-started/use-cases/saas-subscriptions)
- [Offer usage-based pricing](https://stripe.com/get-started/use-cases/usage-based-billing)
- [Set up the customer portal](https://stripe.com/no-code/customer-portal)

**Developers**:
- [Set up your development environment](https://stripe.com/get-started/development-environment)
- [Build on Stripe with LLMs](https://stripe.com/building-with-llms)
- [Integration quickstarts](https://stripe.com/quickstarts)

---

### Supabase
> **The Postgres development platform providing all the backend features you need to build a product.**

**Products**:
| Product | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| [Database](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/database/overview) | Full Postgres with Realtime, backups, extensions |
| [Auth](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/auth) | Email/password, passwordless, OAuth, mobile logins |
| [Storage](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/storage) | File storage with Row Level Security |
| [Realtime](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/realtime) | Database changes, user state sync, broadcasting |
| [Edge Functions](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/functions) | Globally distributed server-side functions |

**Postgres Modules**:
- [AI & Vectors](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/ai)
- [Cron](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/cron)
- [Queues](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/queues)

**Client Libraries**: JavaScript, Flutter, Python, C#, Swift, Kotlin

---

### Auth.js (NextAuth)
> **Authentication for the Web**

**Highlighted Guides**:
- [Configuring OAuth providers](https://authjs.dev/guides/configuring-oauth-providers) — Customize built-in or set up your own
- [OAuth with GitHub](https://authjs.dev/guides/configuring-github) — Step-by-step guide
- [Custom Signin Page](https://authjs.dev/guides/pages/signin) — Match your app's design

**Example Apps**:
| Framework | Live Demo | Source |
|-----------|-----------|--------|
| Next.js | [Visit](https://next-auth-example.vercel.app) | [Clone](https://github.com/nextauthjs/next-auth-example) |
| SvelteKit | [Visit](https://sveltekit-auth-example.vercel.app) | [Clone](https://github.com/nextauthjs/sveltekit-auth-example) |
| Express | [Visit](https://express-auth-example.vercel.app) | [Clone](https://github.com/nextauthjs/express-auth-example) |
| Qwik | [Visit](https://qwik-auth-example.vercel.app) | [Clone](https://github.com/nextauthjs/qwik-auth-example) |

**Supports**: Google, GitHub, Facebook, Twitter, Discord, and 60+ providers

---

### Vercel Templates
> **Jumpstart your app development process with pre-built solutions from Vercel and our community.**

| Template | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| [Next.js Boilerplate](https://vercel.com/templates/next.js/nextjs-boilerplate) | Starter template |

| [Next.js AI Chatbot](https://vercel.com/templates/ai/nextjs-ai-chatbot) | Full-featured, hackable chatbot |

| [Express on Bun](https://vercel.com/templates/backend/express-on-bun) | Express with Bun runtime |
| [Hono on Bun](https://vercel.com/templates/backend/hono-on-bun) | Hono with Bun runtime |
| [Next.js Commerce](https://vercel.com/templates/ecommerce/nextjs-commerce) | Shopify starter kit |
| [Platforms Starter Kit](https://vercel.com/templates/saas/platforms-starter-kit) | Multi-tenant with Redis |
| [Portfolio Starter Kit](https://vercel.com/templates/portfolio/portfolio-starter-kit) | Markdown portfolio |
| [Blog Starter Kit](https://vercel.com/templates/blog/blog-starter-kit) | Static blog with Markdown |
| [Next.js Enterprise Boilerplate](https://vercel.com/templates/saas/nextjs-enterprise-boilerplate) | TypeScript, Tailwind, Radix, Jest, Playwright, Storybook |
| [Lead Agent](https://vercel.com/templates/ai/lead-processing-agent) | Inbound lead qualification with AI SDK |
| [Slack Agent Template](https://vercel.com/templates/ai/slack-agent-template) | Bolt for JavaScript + Nitro |

## 5. Product & Market Validation

### Product Hunt
> **The place to launch and discover new tech products. The best new products in tech.**

**Trending Products Today** (example):
| Product | Description | Upvotes |
|---------|-------------|--------|
| Pandada AI | Build data wealth: Turns files into McKinsey-level insights | 505+ |
| TravelAnimator | Turn Google Maps URLs into stunning map animations | — |
| Meet-Ting | AI that gives your schedule a brain | — |

**Topic Areas**:
- **Tech & AI**: Analytics, Data Visualization, Artificial Intelligence
- **Creativity**: Travel, Maps, Video
- **Productivity**: Meetings, Calendar, Productivity tools

**Features**:
- Daily product launches with community voting (upvotes + comments)
- Maker profiles and team pages
- Collections and topics for discovery
- Discussions and Q&A with founders

**Use Case**: Research trending dev tools and validate your own product idea through community feedback.

---

### G2
> **Where you go for software. The world's largest and most trusted software marketplace.**

**Platform Stats**:
| Metric | Value |
|--------|-------|
| Annual Users | 100+ million professionals |
| Enterprise Adoption | 60% of Forbes Cloud 100 |
| Customer Base | Every Fortune 500 company |

**Main Categories**:
- CRM (Customer Relationship Management)
- ERP Systems (Enterprise Resource Planning)
- Marketing & Marketing Automation
- HR & Office (including HR Analytics)
- Accounting & Expense Management
- AI & Emerging Tech

**Trending Categories**:
- AI Chatbots
- Agentic Analytics
- AI Interview Agents
- Revenue AI Platforms
- Stablecoin Infrastructure

**Use Case**: Compare CRM platforms side-by-side to understand feature gaps your product could fill.

---

### Capterra
> **Find the right software. Capterra helps you find the best solutions for your business.**

**Platform Stats**:
| Metric | Value |
|--------|-------|
| Verified Reviews | 2.5+ million |
| Software Categories | 900+ |
| Businesses Helped | 1+ million |
| Experience | 25+ years |

**Featured Software Types**:
- Project Management (monday.com, Confluence, Jira)
- Accounting
- CRM
- Human Resources
- Construction Management

**Value Proposition**: Evaluate options based on price and features, your business size and industry, and ratings from verified users.

**Media Coverage**: The New York Times, USA Today, BBC, LA Times, Financial Express

**Use Case**: Identify underserved niches by reading common complaints in project management tools.
